products.name: Rene Furterer Forticea Shampoo
products.description: A fortifying daily-use shampoo formulated to energize the scalp and strengthen hair from roots to ends.

products.name: Shu Uemura Ultimate Reset Conditioner
products.description: Repairs and restores very damaged hair with the use of Japanese sourced rice extract. Helps nourish and protect hair from the inside out.

products.name: Shu Uemura Essence Absolue
products.description: A nourishing and protective lightweight oil made from camellia oil that helps add softness and shine to the hair.

products.name: Bioelements Recovery Serum
products.description: A moisture-sealing serum with ultra-smoothing ceramides and emollients for skin that's dry, visibly aging, over-exfoliated.

products.name: 15% Vitamin C + Clean Caffeine Energy Serum
products.description: A lightweight serum to visibly brighten skin, reduce hyperpigmentation, even tone, firm skin and depuff.

products.name: ICE Ceramide Moisturizing Cream
products.description: Ceramide-enriched moisturizer replenishes the skin with lasting hydration and strengthens the skin’s natural moisture barrier against environmental stressors responsible for premature aging.

products.name: Summer Fridays ShadeDrops Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Mineral Milk Sunscreen
products.description: A lightweight, reef-friendly, SPF 30 mineral sunscreen that helps shield skin from UV rays and leaves skin with a soft, natural-looking finish.

products.name: MAC Studio Radiance Face And Body Radiant Sheer Foundation
products.description: An ultra-light, waterproof foundation that provides a sheer buildable veil of coverage with a natural, radiant glow.

products.name: NARS Liquid Blush
products.description: A high-pigmented, liquid blush that brings a flush of natural-looking color to all skin tones.

products.name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Cream Bronzer
products.description: A weightless cream formula that warms up skin for sun-kissed, dimensional color.

products.name: Lancome Teint Idôle Ultra Wear All Over Concealer
products.description: A hydrating, lightweight, full coverage concealer that brightens dark under eyes and covers imperfections without creasing or caking.

products.name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Clear Brow Gel Lightweight Setter
products.description: A lightweight clear brow gel that sets color and holds brow hair in place for a clean, polished look.

products.name: Nars Climax Marscara
products.description: An innovative mascara that delivers buildable volume and intense black color in a lightweight, flexible formula without clumping or smudging.

products.name: Fenty Killawatt Freestyle Highlighter
products.description: A lightweight, longwear cream-powder hybrid highlighter.

products.name: Morphe Continuous Setting Mist
products.description: Delivers even application to set liquid or powder makeup with a radiant finish.
